captions.text: Oven Radio
EXO's Overn Radio announces 12 o'clock.
Oh. Oh. Oh. Oh. O~ven!
EXO's delightful Oven Radio is back.

- Shall we do it energetically again?
- Yes.

People said the members from Monday
did the worst, so we are here again.

- Chen
- Baekhyun
- Luhan
- D.O.
Oven Radio Go~ Go~ Go~

We have lots of things to say today.
Let's start right away.

The first corner is 
'EXO Is Telling You Everything'
What questions are there?
A question from Kim Hye In.
Which part of your body are you most confident in?

- Canine tooth for me
- Canines?
- Yes.
For me, cartilages behind my ears?
I am confident in eyes.

- Wow 
- Eyes
Lips for me

- Lips
- Alright good.
Next question is from KiraKira.

Luhan carries around a huge bag.
What's inside that bag?

- Honestly...
- I heard a rumor saying there are gold bars.
I heard there are bricks.
There is nothing.

This corner is 'My Turn to Cry'
It is the title of a song in our album.

D.O., please explain
what kind of song it is.

It is about a man who wants to cry
instead of his ex-girlfriend
because he doesn't want her to be sad.
It is a pure and beautiful love song.
'My Turn to Cry' is an acoustic ballad.

The lyrics are very good.
It is artistic.
So each of us wrote more tearful lyrics.

- Yes
- Yes we wrote some.

- Shall we show them together?
- Yes. Let's put them up.
Ta-Da

- D.O. Could you start?
- Ok
Pictures that I almost threw away.Now it is too painful to look at them.
Then what should we do with those pictures?
We don't have time for that.

At night that I can't sleep,
sitting woken in a dark room, 
I draw your face.

- It is scary.
- Scary?
Just looking at these lyrics, you can imagine.
Because of her, he can't sleep.
He wakes up and longs for her
Yes he might cry.
Mine is a little bit long

I had a nightmare. 
I woke up before I could hug you crying.

With mirthlessness, I open the curtain
and send tears tinged with moonlight
as a letter to you.

- In his dream, how much did he..
- It is really sad.

Wishing to dream a little bit more.
His mom must have woken him up.

If you sleep again, you can continue the dream.
Right?
Now. Let's go for Chinese.

Love leaves. It's My Turn To Cry.
All the stars are gazing.
I think the tears would become an ocean.
It seems like you wrote your part.

Men are blind in their own causes.
Anyways, we don't have much time.
It is very touching.
The lyrics are very touching.
Which member cries most easily?

- It is Tao.
- Yes. Right.
In the music video, his acting ws great.
I was really surprised.

Since men don't show tears easily,
I guess it looks better.
We are talking about tears.

[D.O. is casted to 'Cart']
D.O. is acting in a movie.
He is an actor.
Do you have a love scene?

- You will know when you watch the movie.
- I see.
I am worried whether I can act well.
You will do fine.
Don't think of it too hard.
Please show us.
Show us. Show us.
Slowly. Control your emotions.
Show us. Show us.
[D.O.'s acting of crying]Action.
[Time passes, but D.O.'s eyes are still dry.]
I think D.O. will need some time to show tears.
Let's come back after the commercials.
Miracles in December are EXO.
Miracles in December are all of you.
Miracles in December are miracles.
'Miracles in December' is the title song of EXO.
'Miracles in December'

What is it?!
I cried when the commercials were on.
I couldn't show it because of the commercials!
Too bad.
We will give you one more chance.

- What about a competition to cry first.
- Good!

- The loser buys chicken?
- Call!
Let's start.
I want to do it too.

- No! You can't.
- Tao does it well! No.
I think I can see his tears already.
We don't have much time.

- Alright.
- Let's start it right away.
[Who cries the first? Start!]

- We have to do the ending as well.
- I can't cry.
Do tears come out?
My tears coming down. Look!
Wow.
[Congratulations! The winner is D.O.]
He really can do it.

[They passed 5 minutes again.
Habitual offenders for TIME OVER]
Wait. Did 5 minutes pass already?

- We should get used to it.
- Is it over?
I guess it is not your day today.
